item.title: Meet Ashen, Our New Hashing Service
item.description: For a while now, one of the main concerns of the Shoko team is our current reliance on select metadata providers to the point where if a crucial metadata provider like AniDB or TvDB were to cut off access, Shoko itself would lose critical functions. To remedy this situation, we’ve been looking into alternative metadata sources and are happy to announce our partnership with animeshon, an upcoming anime & manga metadata provider and their perceptual hashing service Ashen.
